standardComponent: Wildcards should use * for Multicharacter Searches
definition: The asterisk (*) should replace zero or more characters in search terms

standardComponent: Wildcards should use ? for single character replacement
definition: The question mark (?) should replace exactly one character in search terms

standardComponent: A Wildcard character (*) can be used to return all results
definition: Using * as a search should return all records
Search should not be case-sensitive by default

standardComponent: Case sensitive searching for exact phrase searches
definition: Search should be case sensitive for exact phrase searches.
